html:
2.12.21  6:54 am   is the earth flat?

      no, but with enough dedication maybe you could flatten it

2.12.21  5:21 am   How are you this great?

      i bought a greatness button which doesn't work nor exist, so i have been forced to find other solutions on my own

2.12.21  4:00 am   if you don't know what to do when the sky is blue and you don't know what to say when the sky is grey, what do you do when the sky is red?

      maybe sing 'ay oh ay oh' etc

2.12.21  3:02 am   What inspired you to make the history of the world video? (I get the vibe that pretty much all of your videos are inspired by something.)

      i've always been inspired to explain the world. it was only a matter of time before i was feeling reckless enough to attempt it

2.12.21  2:29 am   why do humans like music

      it can express how we really are

2.12.21  2:00 am   Have you figured out how to say Goodbye yet?

      no

2.12.21  1:19 am   How do I finish a project?  I get 75% done and then my focus and passion flies away to another project.  I have a graveyard of unfinished work.

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

2.11.21  11:55 pm   what is the truest thing

      you

2.11.21  10:49 pm   at the time of the writing of  i'm crazy / it's raining, were you actually feeling crazy or did the lyrics come from somewhere else.[and if so where was that :)]

      i always knew i was crazy, although at the time i was feeling very rainy. i suppose i was writing that song to reaffirm to myself that the craziness was indeed still there

2.11.21  9:56 pm   what is music theory? 

      that's entirely up to you. just don't be alarmed if you have to keep changing it. this is normal and fun

2.11.21  8:35 pm   how do i stop doing nothing and start doing something with my life?

      what would you like to do

2.11.21  7:29 pm   have you ever been to Brazil in your imagination?

      yes

2.11.21  6:32 pm   do you like your 2011 songs?

      i am supposed to make each one the way i like it, as i'm making it. In order to finish it, i must convince myself that i have succeeded in doing that. Whether i like it later depends on how gullible i am on any particular day

2.11.21  5:11 pm   How do you deal with fame?

      am slef

2.11.21  4:56 pm   do you think perfection exists?

      yes but only in the context of replicating something, which you have to specify. for example, if you are performing some calculations which are supposed to equal 7.3339, then you can be sure you have calculated that value perfectly when your value is also 7.3339. But if you are making something new, then no one can be sure what the perfect target would be

2.11.21  3:04 pm   are you planning to solve the hard problem of consciousness soon?

      i think so

2.11.21  2:28 pm   opinion on the sky?

      good place to put things

2.11.21  1:20 pm   What is your favorite song?

      i haven't found it yet, that's why i keep making new ones just in case

2.11.21  12:22 pm   I just did a bad thing

      oh now you've got me wondering what the thing is

2.11.21  11:46 am   did you actually go to new canaan, or did you go to conneticut? 

      new canaan is in connecticut

2.11.21  10:15 am   Have you ever thought of doing a meet and greet?

      meet, not greet

2.11.21  9:51 am   how do you write songs?

      the hard part is remembering how easy it is

2.11.21  8:45 am   when will be the next video

      doing it now

2.11.21  7:03 am   Is the balloon at the beginning of "might quit" the same balloon you find at the end of "i'm best friends with my own front door" but as a child?

      no

2.11.21  6:11 am   are you gonna do a face reveal

      never

2.11.21  5:59 am   you can play on a typing keyboard because you can play games, but you can't type on a playing keyboard unless you speak music language. what are your thoughts on this

      you forgot to mention that you might have to know a gaming language to play game

2.11.21  5:01 am   how do you prevent music from sounding plain?

      put in some surprises

2.11.21  4:56 am   when's your next video

      doing it now

2.11.21  3:17 am   Why did you stop making videos?

     to learn how to make videos, but i started again way before i knew

     [also your vids are so creative]

2.11.21  2:07 am   What's an experiment you've conducted?

      writing a song

2.11.21  1:36 am   Do you think there are some aspects of music that everyone can agree are good or bad?

      almost

2.11.21  12:58 am   i've got know your philosophy behind placing trumpet hits in your songs... always in the right playce... they're just so funky

      usually it only fits in one place. so i pretty much try all the places, like "nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, yes, nope, nope, nope" and that's where it goes

2.10.21  11:56 pm   will "here comes the sun" be on spotify or apple music?

      it is there

2.10.21  10:14 pm   why do you sometimes choose to answer the same questions again in the same way?

      perhaps i've been telling the ............. truth

2.10.21  10:08 pm   Can you collaborate with Bill Wurtz (Since you are Bill Wurtz)?

      that sounds like a nightmare

2.10.21  9:53 pm   Supply me with some wisdom

      i will try

2.10.21  9:14 pm   what's the inspiration behind the floating tambourine in here comes the sun?

      just trying to get by

2.10.21  8:41 pm   If the Universe was born at the Big Bang, what existed before then?

      you'd have to use a different timeline for this

2.10.21  8:16 pm   What made you come up with the name "damien maymdien" in "maybe i could eat blades of grass"?

      just rolls off the tongue. and the lips

2.10.21  7:56 pm   what do you think of christmas

      how could something so lovely be so terrible, and how could something terrible be so lovely

2.10.21  7:42 pm   Can we get ]]]] soon?

      i think it was released on october 31, 2014

2.10.21  7:01 pm   who is "you" referring to in "New Canaan"?

      you

2.10.21  6:42 pm   did you pick here comes the sun to record because it was the longest,

     no

     or was it a coincidence

     yes

     (like did you just do a randomized selection

     no

      from a narrowed-down list)

     yes
     just to clarify, it was chosen from a narrowed down list, narrowed down manually (not randomly) and the final selection was made manually (not randomly) and there were many deciding factors but length was not one of the deciding factors

2.10.21  6:18 pm   Will your next video be music

      yes

2.10.21  6:14 pm   I want to do a cover of I just did a bad thing, but have no intrumental talent, do you have instrumentals of your songs so I can do covers?

      that's not a cover, that's karaoke

2.10.21  4:41 pm   Say "ooga booga" if you're not a robot

      that seems all wrong. ooga booga is exactly the kind of thing a robot would say

2.10.21  4:39 pm   How long will a new video take

      should be a reasonable amount of time

2.10.21  3:46 pm   was the timing of releasing 'might quit' and then not releasing a new song for a while planned or was it coincidental? 

      that was a terrible coincidence

2.10.21  2:46 pm   Do you like your own songs?

      i'm supposed to make them how i like them...... if i'm even capable of that

2.10.21  2:16 pm   should ducks be illegal?

      no
